text: Cressensac-Sarrazac is a commune in the Lot department in south-western France. It was established on 1 January 2019 by merger of the former communes of Cressensac (the seat) and Sarrazac.Arrêté préfectoral 2 August 2018 ==See also== *Communes of the Lot department ==References== Category:Communes of Lot (department)
title: Cressensac-Sarrazac
